params.1319:
Cerberus is a stronger and larger three-headed hellhound boss, which is located in her lair, deep beneath the Taverley Dungeon in the cave to the north-east of the hellhound pit.

Attack Styles - Melee, Ranged, Magic, Special
Immunities - Poison, Venom
Slayer categories - Hellhound
params.1320:
Mandatory requirements:
- 91 Slayer
- A hellhound slayer task

Combat Achievement task difficulty:
- Elite
- Master
